ygData.subject: Re: Psalm of Warmth
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found with a good connection and particle density turned off I can weave four barely, three with ease.  With particle density off though many songs have
ygData.messageBody:
I have found with a good connection and particle density turned off I can
weave four barely, three with ease. With particle density off though many
songs have no visible effect (other then a screen icon), so you have to keep
a sharp eye out for the text in the combat spam.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
>
>Depending on lag and such, you might only be able to do 2.
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jennifer Donaldson <cotto004@...>
> >
> >Weave three and four songs at once? I can only do two. How can I do
>more?
> >
> >
> > If you
> >>can manage four songs, I'd do Anthem, Psalm, Chain, Hymn. If
> >>you can only do three,
> >
> >Lanye
> >Level 9
> >Wood Elf Bard
> >Fennin Ro
